channel.title: Michał Daniel - blog
channel.description: My personal blog centered around software development, system administration and issues of privacy and security.

item.title: Markdown Test
item.description:
Basic stuff

This is a test post which will contain enough markup to test CSS styles.

It should have a

  • list
  • link
  • blockquote
  • some code

This is my blockquote.

This is an ordered list:

  1. One
  2. Two
  3. Three

Some code

Let’s put a code in this file here.

This is very
complicated code

Good ther was
some break in the middle
